REASON: Can cause minor stomach ache sometimes but nothing that doesn't go away pretty quickly. No bad side effects.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR DIPENTUM: Have had wonderful luck with this drug. Even after flares and a round of Entocort, it keeps me in check.  Would recommend it highly before all the drugs with horrible side effects!
Have taken pentasa, asacol, mezavant& salofalk over the years but dipentum seems to have worked best, Imuran will be next on the list if I flare again
